~ Theatre Kid ~ Book Nerd ~

~ Bi, Shy, and Ready to Cry ~

summary:
When Crowley walks out of the burning bookstore with Somebody to Love playing in the background? Yeah I felt that. 

Just look...
body:
When Crowley walks out of the burning bookstore with Somebody to Love playing in the background? Yeah I felt that.


Just look at his face. This show just keeps on breaking my heart.

blog.name: codicesandflora
blog.title: Codices and Flora
blog.description:
A Good Omens sideblog for the book and series
Will Feature: meta, discussions, fic, collages, plenty of reblogs of Good Omens posts of all sorts, and lots of excited fandom babbling.
Discourse free blog. I have my head canons (and will write about them at length), but I'm great with other ideas too. 
Bottom line: this is a positive space and I'm just here to have fun, folks. I hope you will too.

tags: I just...can't stop coming up with all these random ideas about them
summary: I've seen a lot of posts that theorize that Crowley fell in love with Aziraphale (or at the very least became endlessly...
body:
I’ve seen a lot of posts that theorize that Crowley fell in love with Aziraphale (or at the very least became endlessly fascinated by him) at that moment on the edge of Eden when he learned that Aziraphale gave away his sword and the reasons why he did it. Which, I totally agree with, honestly.

But now, I can’t stop thinking of a few moments afterward, when Aziraphale shelters Crowley with his wing.

It’s very affectionate, yes, but it also feels super-symbolic. I keep going back to the idea of “taking someone under their wing”. It’s a phrase used to denote someone in a position of power, wisdom or experience making the choice to look after and mentor someone who needs help, instruction, and/or care.

So here you have Aziraphale who meets Crowley: he knows Crowley is a demon, the supposed enemy, the one who encouraged Adam and Eve to defy God. A demon who can (and should) look after himself.

And yet, he still feels moved to offer whatever protection he can to Crowley. He doesn’t shield himself from the rain, but he’ll do that for Crowley because,  yes, Aziraphale simply is that compassionate.

I think that probably made just as much of an impression on Crowley as Aziraphale’s sword ownership choices. 

And it makes me think even more about what kind of role Aziraphale sees for himself in relation to Crowley.

I’ve seen a lot of posts that theorize that Crowley fell in love with Aziraphale (or at the very least became endlessly fascinated by him) at that moment on the edge of Eden when he learned that Aziraphale gave away his sword and the reasons why he did it. Which, I totally agree with, honestly.

It’s a phrase used to denote someone in a position of power, wisdom or experience making the choice to look after and mentor someone who needs help, instruction, and/or care.

So here you have Aziraphale who meets Crowley: he knows Crowley is a demon, the supposed enemy, the one who encouraged Adam and Eve to defy God. A demon who can (and should) look after himself.

And yet, he still feels moved to offer whatever protection he can to Crowley. He doesn’t shield himself from the rain, but he’ll do that for Crowley because,  yes, Aziraphale simply is that compassionate.

summary: okay i love the drunk scene as much as the next person but i just feel like when aziraphale calls the kracken a “big bugger”...
body:
okay i love the drunk scene as much as the next person but i just feel like when aziraphale calls the kracken a “big bugger” there are funnier words he could have used. may i suggest:

  • big boi
  • massive lad
  • big chungus

tags: i might wind up giving in and coming back to this to write more
but i also swear that i'm working on fics so i don't think i want to play.. my entire hand :3
title: autistic aziraphale and crowley
body:
• Aziraphale loves to collect things. He’d never admit it, but it started in Eden when he would wander away from his post to go investigate and set aside interesting rocks to look at later. He took One with him when he finally left (after agonizing for hours, but taking more felt more wrong). 
    • He managed to keep a hold on it until after the Flood, where he lost it. It was devastating. 
    • Crowley kept trying to find and bring him new rocks to make him feel better. Aziraphale kind of hated them at first because they weren’t The Right Ones, but once he calmed down he was grateful that he hadn’t thrown any of them away. He still has a few from this collection. 
  • Crowley, on the other hand, can’t stand clutter. If there’s too much going on in his field of vision he gets distracted and overwhelmed and it sucks. 
    • It’s one of the many reasons he wears sunglasses - they help block out some of his peripheral vision and cut down on visual input, as well as helping him avoid eye-contact, bright lights, and nosy humans. 
  • Aziraphale also loves to eat. He loves exploring the tastes and the textures and the smells. He prefers softer foods instead of crunchy ones, and often has a hard time making himself listen to his body and keep from overeating. 
    • Crowley doesn’t like eating as much, he thinks it’s kind of weird and uncomfortable, and he’s not entirely sure about the whole Chewing thing, but he occasionally makes an effort to indulge Aziraphale. But most of the time, if he orders anything at all, nearly all of it winds up on Aziraphale’s plate instead
  • Aziraphale has never really Gotten Along with other angels very well. everyone thought for sure that he was going to be one of the ones that Fell because he was just always so strange and individual. He made weird noises and moved strangely when he got excited, and the fact that he got excited at all was sometimes weird enough. but he didn’t Fall - only got slightly quiet and subdued for a while - and no one was sure how to deal with him. 
    • It’s why he got stationed in the Garden. he’s always sort of known that it was meant as a kind of punishment, but he loved Earth too much to let that stop him. 
    • No one calls him out for these things directly, because back when She was still around and paying attention, She always seemed perfectly endeared with him, but that doesn’t Really mean that they tolerate it any better. Instead they just find other ways to pick on him.
  • Crowley is fascinated by music. not specifically Queen because that’s mostly just his car, but he loves all sorts of artists and genres - it’s one of the only things he really Collects. He likes hearing the different instruments and rhythms, and watching him listen to music is fun because he gets So Into It, it’s like a full body experience. He’s also incredibly good at being able to separate out the different vocals/instruments and identifying or just focusing on them while the song is playing. 
    • Aziraphale doesn’t care too much for listening to music himself (his audio processing just gives out on him most of the time and it just sounds like Noise) but he loves to listen to Crowley talk about it.
  • They’re both incredibly obsessed with animals, though Crowley’s interest usually translates into a collection of strange or unsettling fun facts while Aziraphale leans more towards ‘this animal is So Fun to pet’ 
    • Aziraphale sort of adores when Crowley is in his snake form because he loves to touch Crowley’s scales, although he’s always Very Careful about how he does so because if he does it wrong or too much then Crowley starts to hate it. 
  • Besides exploring fun textures, Aziraphale also Loves to body stim!! He’s always wiggling around or rocking back and forth or flapping his hands and kicking his feet!!! He’s just constantly in motion! it’s so good!!
    • He’s always kept his hair short because he Hates the feeling of it touching his neck but he Does love to run his fingers through his feathers! His wings always look a little unkempt because he’s constantly touching them and jostling feathers out of place when he does. (Plus, he’s never been entirely comfortable with getting his wings groomed by the other angels) 
  • Crowley is more content with subtler stims; he loves to listen to music, he used to twirl his hair a lot back when it was longer, has a small hoard of stim toys. Occasionally also likes to switch into his snake form because he enjoys the feeling of moving around in that body, but he Hates it when he’s pet in long strokes; it just feels terrible. 
  • One of the things Aziraphale has trouble dealing with is Change, which is why he’s so slow-going in actually acknowledging his and Crowley’s relationship, but also why he dresses so out of style. He has trouble finding clothes that are Comfortable and not distressing to wear, and by the time he’s found something that he Likes it’s almost always already out of fashion, but that’s not going to stop him from wearing it for the next 200 years. 
  • Aziraphale and Crowley are both Absolute Disasters at talking to other people - they just Cannot figure it out. Not to mention that they’ve known each other so long that they’ve fallen into sort of bad conversation habits because they just know that the other will be able to interpret what they mean. (Sometimes when they’re together it makes talking to other people easier, but not always. a lot of the time it can either go the direction of Crowley making an unintelligible noise/Aziraphale saying something totally left-field strange and the other interpreting to whoever they’re talking to OR it’s just twice the usual disaster)
    • It takes Crowley ages to put words together and get them out, but he also doesn’t want the conversation to move on without him, so he just makes strange noises in the interim to indicate that he has something to say. Aziraphale can usually start getting words out quickly but loses focus or courage and winds up stammering over them a lot
    • Aziraphale is also prone to quoting obscure books when he’s lost on what to say for himself. Crowley uses song lyrics.
    • They take turns infodumping to each other

This is getting… too long, but PLEASE feel free to add on!!

  • Aziraphale and Crowley are both Absolute Disasters at talking to other people - they just Cannot figure it out. Not to mention that they’ve known each other so long that they’ve fallen into sort of bad conversation habits because they just know that the other will be able to interpret what they mean. (Sometimes when they’re together it makes talking to other people easier, but not always. a lot of the time it can either go the direction of Crowley making an unintelligible noise/Aziraphale saying something totally left-field strange and the other interpreting to whoever they’re talking to OR it’s just twice the usual disaster)
    • It takes Crowley ages to put words together and get them out, but he also doesn’t want the conversation to move on without him, so he just makes strange noises in the interim to indicate that he has something to say. Aziraphale can usually start getting words out quickly but loses focus or courage and winds up stammering over them a lot
    • Aziraphale is also prone to quoting obscure books when he’s lost on what to say for himself. Crowley uses song lyrics.
    • They take turns infodumping to each other

This is getting… too long, but PLEASE feel free to add on!!
trail.content:
• Aziraphale loves to collect things. He’d never admit it, but it started in Eden when he would wander away from his post to go investigate and set aside interesting rocks to look at later. He took One with him when he finally left (after agonizing for hours, but taking more felt more wrong). 
    • He managed to keep a hold on it until after the Flood, where he lost it. It was devastating. 
    • Crowley kept trying to find and bring him new rocks to make him feel better. Aziraphale kind of hated them at first because they weren’t The Right Ones, but once he calmed down he was grateful that he hadn’t thrown any of them away. He still has a few from this collection. 
  • Crowley, on the other hand, can’t stand clutter. If there’s too much going on in his field of vision he gets distracted and overwhelmed and it sucks. 
    • It’s one of the many reasons he wears sunglasses - they help block out some of his peripheral vision and cut down on visual input, as well as helping him avoid eye-contact, bright lights, and nosy humans. 
  • Aziraphale also loves to eat. He loves exploring the tastes and the textures and the smells. He prefers softer foods instead of crunchy ones, and often has a hard time making himself listen to his body and keep from overeating. 
    • Crowley doesn’t like eating as much, he thinks it’s kind of weird and uncomfortable, and he’s not entirely sure about the whole Chewing thing, but he occasionally makes an effort to indulge Aziraphale. But most of the time, if he orders anything at all, nearly all of it winds up on Aziraphale’s plate instead
  • Aziraphale has never really Gotten Along with other angels very well. everyone thought for sure that he was going to be one of the ones that Fell because he was just always so strange and individual. He made weird noises and moved strangely when he got excited, and the fact that he got excited at all was sometimes weird enough. but he didn’t Fall - only got slightly quiet and subdued for a while - and no one was sure how to deal with him. 
    • It’s why he got stationed in the Garden. he’s always sort of known that it was meant as a kind of punishment, but he loved Earth too much to let that stop him. 
    • No one calls him out for these things directly, because back when She was still around and paying attention, She always seemed perfectly endeared with him, but that doesn’t Really mean that they tolerate it any better. Instead they just find other ways to pick on him.
  • Crowley is fascinated by music. not specifically Queen because that’s mostly just his car, but he loves all sorts of artists and genres - it’s one of the only things he really Collects. He likes hearing the different instruments and rhythms, and watching him listen to music is fun because he gets So Into It, it’s like a full body experience. He’s also incredibly good at being able to separate out the different vocals/instruments and identifying or just focusing on them while the song is playing. 
    • Aziraphale doesn’t care too much for listening to music himself (his audio processing just gives out on him most of the time and it just sounds like Noise) but he loves to listen to Crowley talk about it.
  • They’re both incredibly obsessed with animals, though Crowley’s interest usually translates into a collection of strange or unsettling fun facts while Aziraphale leans more towards ‘this animal is So Fun to pet’ 
    • Aziraphale sort of adores when Crowley is in his snake form because he loves to touch Crowley’s scales, although he’s always Very Careful about how he does so because if he does it wrong or too much then Crowley starts to hate it. 
  • Besides exploring fun textures, Aziraphale also Loves to body stim!! He’s always wiggling around or rocking back and forth or flapping his hands and kicking his feet!!! He’s just constantly in motion! it’s so good!!
    • He’s always kept his hair short because he Hates the feeling of it touching his neck but he Does love to run his fingers through his feathers! His wings always look a little unkempt because he’s constantly touching them and jostling feathers out of place when he does. (Plus, he’s never been entirely comfortable with getting his wings groomed by the other angels) 
  • Crowley is more content with subtler stims; he loves to listen to music, he used to twirl his hair a lot back when it was longer, has a small hoard of stim toys. Occasionally also likes to switch into his snake form because he enjoys the feeling of moving around in that body, but he Hates it when he’s pet in long strokes; it just feels terrible. 
  • One of the things Aziraphale has trouble dealing with is Change, which is why he’s so slow-going in actually acknowledging his and Crowley’s relationship, but also why he dresses so out of style. He has trouble finding clothes that are Comfortable and not distressing to wear, and by the time he’s found something that he Likes it’s almost always already out of fashion, but that’s not going to stop him from wearing it for the next 200 years. 
  • Aziraphale and Crowley are both Absolute Disasters at talking to other people - they just Cannot figure it out. Not to mention that they’ve known each other so long that they’ve fallen into sort of bad conversation habits because they just know that the other will be able to interpret what they mean. (Sometimes when they’re together it makes talking to other people easier, but not always. a lot of the time it can either go the direction of Crowley making an unintelligible noise/Aziraphale saying something totally left-field strange and the other interpreting to whoever they’re talking to OR it’s just twice the usual disaster)
    • It takes Crowley ages to put words together and get them out, but he also doesn’t want the conversation to move on without him, so he just makes strange noises in the interim to indicate that he has something to say. Aziraphale can usually start getting words out quickly but loses focus or courage and winds up stammering over them a lot
    • Aziraphale is also prone to quoting obscure books when he’s lost on what to say for himself. Crowley uses song lyrics.
    • They take turns infodumping to each other

This is getting… too long, but PLEASE feel free to add on!!

summary: When I Watch the World Burn, All I Think About is You - Chapter 1 - greywolfheir
title: When I Watch the World Burn, All I Think About is You - Chapter 1 - greywolfheir
excerpt: Long ago, a war between humans and fairies led the to the banishment of fairies from the world of men. Now, one of those fairies--a dragon--has been terrorizing the Engelite kingdom, and Aziraphale must go on a quest to defeat the dragon in order to claim his right to the throne, joined by his personal knight and best friend, Sir Crowley.
description:
Hey guys, I wrote a multi-chapter AU fic! I began this long before the show was announced but it did inspire me to finish. Still, this is definitely book-based, so keep that in mind.

I’ll be posting each chapter one at a time every Wednesday, with a total of 7 chapters so if you want to wait for the full fic, that will be on August 7th.
